title: fry
description: This is my go-to recipe on a weekly basis. I tend not to buy ready-mixed bags of stir-fry vegetables – although those are perfectly good for this recipe.
ingredients: 1 large red chilli, sliced diagonally (seeds in or out depending on how much heat you like)
150g/5½oz asparagus, woody ends removed, halved and sliced diagonally
salt and freshly ground black pepper
